text: Patriarch Demetrius I or Patriarch Demetrios I may refer to: * Patriarch Demetrius I of Alexandria, ruled in 189–232 * Demetrius of Bulgaria, Patriarch of Bulgaria in 927–c. 930 * Demetrius I Qadi, Patriarch of the Melkite Greek Catholic Church in 1919–25 * Patriarch Dimitrije, Serbian Patriarch in 1920–1930 * Demetrios I of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch in 1972–1991
title: Patriarch Demetrius I
